titleStmt.title: An ansuer vntho [sic] the complaint of R. Cant. that he is an athean, Ievv, vilain, traitour, in Rabbi Dauid farars [sic] disputation at Amsteldam.
titleStmt.author: Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Trinity College (University of Cambridge). Library.
